briefdescription.para: Constructs an LLA (Latitude, Longitude, Altitude) object.
Equality operator.

parameterdescription.para: Another LLA object to compare with.

simplesect.para: True if both LLA objects are equal.

briefdescription.para: Inequality operator.

parameterdescription.para: Another LLA object to compare with.

simplesect.para: True if both LLA objects are not equal.

briefdescription.para: Checks if the LLA object is defined.

simplesect.para: True if the LLA object is defined.

briefdescription.para: Gets the latitude angle.

simplesect.para: Latitude angle.

briefdescription.para: Gets the longitude angle.

simplesect.para: Longitude angle.

briefdescription.para: Gets the altitude length.

simplesect.para: Altitude length.

briefdescription.para: Returns an LLA object representing the position on the surface.

simplesect.para: An LLA object on the surface.

memberdef.argsstring: (const LLA &aLLA, const Length &anEllipsoidEquatorialRadius=Length::Undefined(), const Real &anEllipsoidFlattening=Real::Undefined()) const
memberdef.name: calculateDistanceTo

briefdescription.para: Calculate the distance between this LLA coordinate and another LLA coordinate.

detaileddescription.para: Calculate the distance between this LLA coordinate and another LLA coordinate. Will use the central celestial from the global environment if no ellipsoid parameters are provided.

simplesect.para: Distance between the two LLA coordinates

memberdef.argsstring: (const LLA &aLLA, const Length &anEllipsoidEquatorialRadius=Length::Undefined(), const Real &anEllipsoidFlattening=Real::Undefined()) const
memberdef.name: calculateAzimuthTo

briefdescription.para: Calculate the azimuth angles between this LLA coordinate and another LLA coordinate. Will use the central celestial from the global environment if no ellipsoid parameters are provided.

simplesect.para: Azimuth angle from this LLA coordinate to the other LLA coordinate, and azimuth angle from the other LLA coordinate to this LLA coordinate.

memberdef.argsstring: (const LLA &aLLA, const Real &aRatio, const Length &anEllipsoidEquatorialRadius=Length::Undefined(), const Real &anEllipsoidFlattening=Real::Undefined()) const
memberdef.name: calculateIntermediateTo

briefdescription.para: Calculate a point between this LLA coordinate and another LLA coordinate. Will use the central celestial from the global environment if no ellipsoid parameters are provided.

simplesect.para: A point between the two LLA coordinates

memberdef.argsstring: (const Angle &aDirection, const Length &aDistance, const Length &anEllipsoidEquatorialRadius=Length::Undefined(), const Real &anEllipsoidFlattening=Real::Undefined()) const
memberdef.name: calculateForward

briefdescription.para: Propagate this LLA coordinate in provided direction and distance. Will use the central celestial from the global environment if no ellipsoid parameters are provided.

simplesect.para: Propagated LLA coordinate

memberdef.argsstring: (const LLA &aLLA, const Size &aNumberOfPoints, const Length &anEllipsoidEquatorialRadius=Length::Undefined(), const Real &anEllipsoidFlattening=Real::Undefined()) const
memberdef.name: calculateLinspaceTo

briefdescription.para: Generate LLAs between this LLA coordinate and another LLA coordinate at a given interval. Will use the central celestial from the global environment if no ellipsoid parameters are provided.
Converts the LLA (Latitude, Longitude, Altitude) object to a 3D vector.

simplesect.para: 3D vector representation of the LLA object.

briefdescription.para: Convert LLA coordinates to a 2D point.

simplesect.para: 2D point (Longitude, Latitude)

briefdescription.para: Convert LLA coordinates to a 3D point.

simplesect.para: 3D point (Longitude, Latitude, Altitude)

briefdescription.para: Converts the LLA (Latitude, Longitude, Altitude) object to Cartesian coordinates.

simplesect.para: 3D vector representing the Cartesian coordinates.

briefdescription.para: Converts the LLA (Latitude, Longitude, Altitude) object to a string representation.

simplesect.para: String representation of the LLA object.

briefdescription.para: Output stream operator.

simplesect.para: Reference to the output stream.

briefdescription.para: Constructs an undefined LLA (Latitude, Longitude, Altitude) object.

simplesect.para: Undefined LLA object.

briefdescription.para: Constructs an LLA (Latitude, Longitude, Altitude) object from a 3D vector.

simplesect.para: LLA object constructed from the 3D vector.

briefdescription.para: Constructs an LLA (Latitude, Longitude, Altitude) object from Cartesian coordinates.

simplesect.para: LLA object constructed from the Cartesian coordinates.

memberdef.argsstring: (const LLA &aFirstLLA, const LLA &aSecondLLA, const Length &anEllipsoidEquatorialRadius=Length::Undefined(), const Real &anEllipsoidFlattening=Real::Undefined())
memberdef.name: DistanceBetween

briefdescription.para: Calculate the distance between two LLA coordinates. Will use the central celestial from the global environment if no ellipsoid parameters are provided.

simplesect.para: Distance between the two LLA coordinates

memberdef.argsstring: (const LLA &aFirstLLA, const LLA &aSecondLLA, const Length &anEllipsoidEquatorialRadius=Length::Undefined(), const Real &anEllipsoidFlattening=Real::Undefined())

briefdescription.para: Calculate the azimuth angles between two LLA coordinates. Will use the central celestial from the global environment if no ellipsoid parameters are provided.

simplesect.para: Azimuth angles between the two LLA coordinates

memberdef.name: Linspace

briefdescription.para: Generate equidistant LLAs between two LLA coordinates for the specified number of points. Will use the central celestial from the global environment if no ellipsoid parameters are provided.

simplesect.para: intermediate equidistant LLAs between the two LLA coordinates

briefdescription.para: Constructs an LLA from a Position. If a celestial object is not provided, the central body from the global environment instance will be used if it's available.

parameterdescription.para: A shared pointer to a celestial object

briefdescription.para: Geodetic Latitude - Longitude - Altitude (LLA)
